articles.title: First private moon lander to touch down safely starts sending selfies - The Register
articles.description: Firefly Aerospace’s Blue Ghost planned to work for 14 days, should be useful for years thanks to its reflector that improves on Apollo-era tech
articles.content:
Sunday March 2nd has become a notable day in humanitys exploration of outer space, after Firefly Aerospace became the first private company to successfully land a spacecraft on the Moon.
